db:select.doc:name: select customers whose wish matches sku and haven't received a notification in last 24 hrs
db:select.db:parameterized-query: select c.id, c.first_name, c.sms, c.email, c.mobile_device_token, nt.id as notification_type_id, nt.name, w.wish_id from wish w, customer c, notification_preference np, notification_type nt where w.customer_id = #[xpath:/mes:notifySKUItemMovement/mod:CustomerId] and w.sku_item_id = #[xpath:/mes:notifySKUItemMovement/mod:TransactedSku/sku] and np.customer_id = c.id and np.notification_type_id = nt.id and not w.id in (select n.wish_id from notification n, wish w, sku_item si where n.wish_id = w.id and w.sku_item_id = si.id and w.customer_id != #[xpath:/mes:notifySKUItemMovement/mod:CustomerId] and datediff(n.date, curdate()) >= 1)

db:insert.doc:name: insert notification
db:insert.db:parameterized-query: insert into notification(date, wish_id, notification_type_id) values(curdate(), payload.wish_id, payload.notification_type_id)

apple-push:send.alert: Hello #[payload.first_name]. Your Wish-list item, #[payload.item_name], is in high demand. Better hurry up if you want to grab one before we run out! :)
apple-push:send.doc:name: Apple Push Notification

smtp:outbound-endpoint.doc:name: Email notification
smtp:outbound-endpoint.subject: Your wish list item is running out of stock

twilio:send-sms-message.body: Hello #[payload.first_name]. Your Wish-list item, #[payload.item_name], is in high demand. Better hurry up if you want to grab one before we run out! :)
twilio:send-sms-message.doc:name: SMS Notification
